title: I have an account and i was playing last night and now i can't sign on at all
body: I was playing yesterday and all of a sudden my chat went out to where i can't see anyone online so i restarted my client and tried to sign back in and it said that my username and password do not match. what is happening please let me know:( i need help finding this out. either someone hacked me or some how i got banned or something i don't know. PLEASE SOMEONE HELP ME HERE.

replies.body: Hey, I took a look at your account but don't see anything really suspicious going on.  Make sure you're set to the correct region on the login screen.  If the error is still happening, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case there might be a network issue blocking you from reaching our authentication server.
still hasn't worked i did the hextech clean up thing and its still doing it i don't know why it does but its still giving me the can't match this with this

No worries, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help figure out what's going on and regain access to the account.  See you there!
i have but no answer yet. and its kind of annoying i haven't gotten a response yet.
